responses.prompt: Write a tagline for an ice cream shop
responses.text: "Where the sweetest things come to life."

responses.prompt: Write a poem about a happy dog who loves hats
responses.text:
My happy dog loves hats,
And I love that he loves them too!
He's always happy when he sees me put on a new hat,
And he can't wait to show it off to everyone!
He loves to go for walks,
And he loves to play with his friends,
